players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Wow, I can't believe Charlie is already gone! This is going to be tough. We need to figure out who among us might be the detective and work together."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions, but keep an open mind and consider all possibilities. We should focus on gathering information and working together as a team."
Bob: "Let's not forget that we lost a team member last night. We need to focus on finding out who among us is the mafia and eliminate them to ensure our team's victory."
Diana: "Bob seems overly focused on reminding us about the mafia threat. Maybe he's trying to deflect attention away from himself."
Bob: "Let's not forget that we lost a valuable team member last night. It is crucial that we identify and eliminate the mafia among us to ensure our team's victory."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
